title: Why is it that tanks do so much ridiculous amounts of dmg?
body: {{champion:516}} takes litterly no dmg yet deals retarded amounts of dmg has tons of cc a gap closer and ranged flamethrower. How in the hell is this balanced

replies.body:
I don't know what is going on in everyone else's games, but I think tanks are comparatively weaker post patch, when contrasted with virtually anything.

That being said, they remain very influential because assassin damage was increased, and even the weakened tanks can beat the suddenly widely played assassins.
% hp damage, every tank has to have one somewhere in their kits for whatever reason.
Counterplay.   Ornn has tonnes of it
